ar_empowerment.summary: Art of the Glaive empowerment cycle
facts: Reaver's Glaive grants glaive_flurry AND rending_strike simultaneously
Fracture-first applies 2 stacks Reaver's Mark (14% amp, 20s)
Soul Cleave-first applies 1 stack Reaver's Mark + 12 burst strikes
700ms delay between first and second empowered ability
20 fragments consumed = 1 empowerment; Sigil of Spite bypasses this
aplImplications: Default to Fracture-first for 2x RM maintenance
SC-first only when RM stacks=2 AND remains > time_to_next_empowerment + 5

facts: Building stacks have NO duration timeout (persist indefinitely)
Spending stacks have NO duration timeout (persist indefinitely)
3 Soul Cleaves required to consume all spending stacks = 105 fury minimum
World Killer (3rd meteor) fires automatically when final stack consumed
Mass Acceleration (Meta) overwrites existing building stacks
aplImplications: Add fury>=105 guard before triggering 2→3 building stack transition
No timeout pressure — can pool fury indefinitely during building phase
